snippet: Curling is not an N.C.A.A.-sanctioned sport, but Wisconsin-Green Bay is one of many schools with teams on campus that compete in tournaments, called bonspiels.
abstract: College curling teams are busy preparing for USA Curling College Championship, which will be held at Rochester Curling Club in New York.
lead_paragraph: Curling is not an N.C.A.A.-sanctioned sport, but Wisconsin-Green Bay is one of many schools with teams on campus that compete in tournaments, called bonspiels.
